original_title: Como Ganhar na Loteria Sem Perder a Esportiva
overview: A comedy about the happiness of several people who won the number 12 of Sports Lottery, thinking they are the only winner. Among them, one priest seduced by the devil disguised as a sacristan, one taxi driver who is planning to buy an entire fleet of cars, and prostitutes who leave their brothel, only to return again later.
title: Como Ganhar na Loteria Sem Perder a Esportiva
